Boarding

Enrichment-Based Dog Care

What Does Enrichment Based Mean? It means that whether your dog is here for boarding or daycare they will have access to: Small group off leash play, your puppy will be happy-tired NOT exhausted Physical agility exercises, Mental enrichment activities, and rest times.

Enrichment-Based Boarding

$45/night

$22/Additional Pet

  • Small group off leash play
  • Physical agility exercises
  • Mental enrichment activities
  • Rest times
  • A night's stay with quality care
